title: Jeb: 愚人节“bug”已经被修复

txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-4-3 17:58 编辑 

Jeb: Phew, order has been restored. In other news, Minecraft Realms is now available in Canada!
Jeb: 呼~，秩序已经恢复了。还有一件事，就是Minecraft Realms已经入驻加拿大了！（那天朝呢）
